info.title: PokeAPI World (Independent Publisher)
info.description: Access Pokemon world data including machines, locations, regions, and berries.

get.description: Machines are the representation of items that teach moves to Pokemon. They vary from version to version, so it is not certain that one specific TM or HM corresponds to a single Machine.

item.description: The TM or HM item that corresponds to this machine.
item.title: Item

move.description: The move that is taught by this machine.
move.title: Move

get.description: Machines are the representation of items that teach moves to Pokemon. They vary from version to version, so it is not certain that one specific TM or HM corresponds to a single Machine.
Locations that can be visited within the games. Locations make up sizable portions of regions, like cities or routes.

region.description: The region this location can be found in.
region.title: Region

areas.description: Areas that can be found within this location.
areas.title: Areas

get.description: Locations that can be visited within the games. Locations make up sizable portions of regions, like cities or routes.
Location areas are sections of areas, such as floors in a building or cave. Each area has its own set of possible Pokemon encounters.

encounter_method.description: The method in which Pokemon may be encountered in an area..
encounter_method.title: Encounter Method

rate.description: The chance of an encounter to occur.
rate.title: Rate

version.description: The version of the game in which the encounter can occur with the given chance.
version.title: Version

version_details.description: The chance of the encounter to occur on a version of the game.
version_details.title: Version Details

encounter_method_rates.description: A list of methods in which Pokemon may be encountered in this area and how likely the method will occur depending on the version of the game.
encounter_method_rates.title: Encounter Method Rates

location.description: The region this location area can be found in.
location.title: Location

version.description: The game version this encounter happens in.
version.title: Version

max_chance.description: The total percentage of all encounter potential.
max_chance.title: Max Chance

min_level.description: The lowest level the Pokemon could be encountered at.
min_level.title: Min Level

max_level.description: The highest level the Pokemon could be encountered at.
max_level.title: Max Level

condition_values.description: A list of condition values that must be in effect for this encounter to occur.
condition_values.title: Condition Values

chance.description: Percent chance that this encounter will occur.
chance.title: Chance

method.description: The method by which this encounter happens.
method.title: Method

encounter_details.description: A list of encounters and their specifics.
encounter_details.title: Encounter Details

version_details.description: A list of versions and encounters with Pokemon that might happen in the referenced location area.
version_details.title: Version Details

pokemon_encounters.description: A list of Pokemon that can be encountered in this area along with version specific details about the encounter.
pokemon_encounters.title: Pokemon Encounters

get.description: Location areas are sections of areas, such as floors in a building or cave. Each area has its own set of possible Pokemon encounters.
A region is an organized area of the Pokemon world. Most often, the main difference between regions is the species of Pokemon that can be encountered within them.

locations.description: A list of locations that can be found in this region.
locations.title: Locations

main_generation.description: The generation this region was introduced in.
main_generation.title: Main Generation

pokedexes.description: A list of pokedexes that catalogue Pokemon in this region.
pokedexes.title: Pokedexes

get.description: A region is an organized area of the Pokemon world. Most often, the main difference between regions is the species of Pokemon that can be encountered within them.
Methods by which the player might can encounter Pokemon in the wild, e.g., walking in tall grass.
Methods by which the player might can encounter Pokemon in the wild, e.g., walking in tall grass.
Conditions which affect what pokemon might appear in the wild, e.g., day or night.

values.description: A list of possible values for this encounter condition.
values.title: Values

get.description: Conditions which affect what pokemon might appear in the wild, e.g., day or night.
Encounter condition values are the various states that an encounter condition can have, i.e., time of day can be either day or night.

condition.description: The condition this encounter condition value pertains to.
condition.title: Condition

get.description: Encounter condition values are the various states that an encounter condition can have, i.e., time of day can be either day or night.
Berries are small fruits that can provide HP and status condition restoration, stat enhancement, and even damage negation when eaten by Pokemon.

growth_time.description: Time it takes the tree to grow one stage, in hours. Berry trees go through four of these growth stages before they can be picked.
growth_time.title: Growth Time

max_harvest.description: The maximum number of these berries that can grow on one tree in Generation IV.
max_harvest.title: Max Harvest

natural_gift_power.description: The power of the move 'Natural Gift' when used with this Berry.
natural_gift_power.title: Natural Gift Power

size.description: The size of this Berry, in millimeters.
size.title: Size

smoothness.description: The smoothness of this Berry, used in making Pokeblocks or Poffins.
smoothness.title: Smoothness

soil_dryness.description: The speed at which this Berry dries out the soil as it grows. A higher rate means the soil dries more quickly.
soil_dryness.title: Soil Dryness

firmness.description: The firmness of this berry, used in making Pokeblocks or Poffins.
firmness.title: Firmness

potency.description: How powerful the referenced flavor is for this berry.
potency.title: Potency

flavors.description: flavoA list of references to each flavor a berry can have and the potency of each of those flavors in regard to this berry.rs
flavors.title: Flavors

item.description: Berries are actually items. This is a reference to the item specific data for this berry.
item.title: Item

natural_gift_type.description: The type inherited by 'Natural Gift' when used with this Berry.
natural_gift_type.title: Natural Gift Type

get.description: Berries are small fruits that can provide HP and status condition restoration, stat enhancement, and even damage negation when eaten by Pokemon.

An item is an object in the games which the player can pick up, keep in their bag, and use in some manner. They have various uses, including healing, powering up, helping catch Pokemon, or to access a new area.

cost.description: The price of this item in stores.
cost.title: Cost

fling_power.description: The power of the move Fling when used with this item.
fling_power.title: Fling Power

fling_effect.description: The effect of the move Fling when used with this item.
fling_effect.title: Fling Effect

attributes.description: A list of attributes this item has.
attributes.title: Attributes

category.description: The category of items this item falls into.
category.title: Category

effect.description: The localized effect text for an API resource in a specific language.
effect.title: Effect

short_effect.description: The localized effect text in brief.
short_effect.title: Short Effect

effect_entries.description: The effect of this ability listed in different languages.
effect_entries.title: Effect Entries

text.description: The localized name for an API resource in a specific language.
text.title: Text

flavor_text_entries.description: The flavor text of this ability listed in different languages.
flavor_text_entries.title: Flavor Text Entries

default.description: The default depiction of this item.
default.title: Default

sprites.description: A set of sprites used to depict this item in the game.
sprites.title: Sprites

pokemon.description: The Pokemon that holds this item.
pokemon.title: Pokemon

rarity.description: How often this Pokemon holds this item in this version.
rarity.title: Rarity

version.description: The version that this item is held in by the Pokemon.
version.title: Version

version_details.description: The details for the version that this item is held in by the Pokemon.
version_details.title: Version Details

held_by_pokemon.description: A list of Pokemon that might be found in the wild holding this item.
held_by_pokemon.title: Held By Pokemon

baby_trigger_for.description: An evolution chain this item requires to produce a bay during mating.
baby_trigger_for.title: Baby Trigger For

get.description: An item is an object in the games which the player can pick up, keep in their bag, and use in some manner. They have various uses, including healing, powering up, helping catch Pokemon, or to access a new area.

gameIndexProperty.description: The internal id of an API resource within game data.
gameIndexProperty.title: Game Index

count.description: The total number of resources available from this API.
count.title: Count

next.description: The URL for the next page in the list.
next.title: Next

previous.description: The URL for the previous page in the list.
previous.title: Previous

official.description: Whether or not the games are published in this language.
official.title: Is official

iso639.description: The two-letter code of the country where this language is spoken. Note that it is not unique.
iso639.title: ISO 639

iso3166.description: The two-letter code of the language. Note that it is not unique.
iso3166.title: ISO 3166

NamesType.description: The name of this resource listed in different languages.
NamesType.title: Names

VersionGroupType.description: Version group details of this information.
VersionGroupType.title: Version group details

generation.description: The generation relevent to this game index.
generation.title: Generation

GameIndexType.description: A list of game indices relevent to this resource by generation.
GameIndexType.title: Game Indices

idOrNameParam.name: id or name
idOrNameParam.description: Unique ID or Name of the resource.

limitParam.name: limit
limitParam.description: Limit the results to be returned, default is 20.
